TopicTitle: Targeting reticules jitter badly after 1.04 update

Articles.Content: Since the 1.04 update the targeting reticules on the navglobe sometimes jitter so badly they are unusable. Has anyone else encountered this problem?

Are you talking about the purple one (i.e. the target marker) or the yellow one (target-relative velocity)? The latter has been always been acting up, as far as I remember. Although I think since 1.0 it's become a lot worse to the point that at times the navball is pretty much unusable. (Sadly, that can be said about a lot of things since 1"I'm not early access any more".0)

Sometimes it helps to briefly go into time-warp, so things keep still and you get at least an idea of where stuff is pointing.
Yeah, I didn't really notice a big problem until the 1.04 update. Both the yellow and purple reticules have extremely bad jitter sometimes. Thanks for the tip... I'll try it out and see if it helps.
